Empty space prompt

This component is for displaying a message to users about why there's no content in an area of the page.

    • Jumbotron

    Basic Jumbotron

    The Jumbotron (AKA Billboard) is used to showcase important information in a prominent position on the page.

    Important Headline

    Create interactive, decision logic based experiences for your customers! A Journey can house anything form a simple email to a complex year-long multi-stage campaign that reacts to the actions taken by the recipients along the way.

    Modal

    Basic example

    Use modals to display information to the user in a dialog-style overlay. Just about anything can be put into a modal, and they automatically scroll if the content is longer than the viewport.
